pullrequest.title: Add animate_box example and update animate_pose example to support current version.

content.raw: I just did a quick test, inserting a double_pendulum_with_base into a world and looking at the `~/pose/info` and `~/pose/local/info`. It has the pose for 4 entities: the model `double_pendulum_with_base` and its three links `double_pendulum_with_base::base`, `double_pendulum_with_base::upper_link`, and `double_pendulum_with_base::lower_link`. It looks like each model pose is relative to the world, while the link poses are relative to the model pose.
content.html: I just did a quick test, inserting a double_pendulum_with_base into a world and looking at the ~/pose/info and ~/pose/local/info. It has the pose for 4 entities: the model double_pendulum_with_base and its three links double_pendulum_with_base::base, double_pendulum_with_base::upper_link, and double_pendulum_with_base::lower_link. It looks like each model pose is relative to the world, while the link poses are relative to the model pose.
